resources.string:
a* KAMATIS
 v1.1

 Mobile version of out thesis entitled:

 Determination of Maturity Stage, Shelf-life, Nutritional Content and Suggested Use for the Stages of Tomatoes Using Color Space Conversion Algorithm Using Raspberry Pi

Note that during the testing, all test should be done in a controlled environment.

 Users are expected to adjust the environment lighting and the camera distance from the tomato.

 First, select a tomato to scan.

 Place it in a place with white background. The background should be light because of we are thresholding it.

 Use the application to view the tomato in camera.

 Click the Binary Button and adjust the threshold so that the tomato is only the region of white pixels.

 Click the Capture Button and see the results.
